x=input();
for round in xrange(x):
	n = input();
	if n <= 1:
		print n
		continue;
	d = n - 1;
	l = d; 
	d = 2 * d;	# find dCl
	Denom = 1;
	Num   = 1;
	if l < d - l :
		for i in xrange(1,l+1):
			Denom = (Denom * i);
		for i in xrange(d - l + 1, d+1):
			Num = (Num * i);
	else :
		for i in xrange(1,d-l+1):
			Denom = (Denom * i);
		for i in xrange(l+1,d+1):
			Num = (Num * i);
	if Denom > 0 :
		print ((Num / Denom)/(n))%10000
	else:
		print "0"
